component.name: LayerOverview
component.file: LayerOverview.swf (compiled layer, needed for publication on internet)
LayerOverview.xml (configurationfile for layer, needed for publication on internet)
component.description: This layer drawes a overviewreactangle on a map.

configtag.name: <fmc:LayerOverview>
<fmc:LayerOverview>

attribute.name: color
color
attribute.description: Color of the rectangle in a hexadecimal notation.

attribute.name: followfactor
followfactor
attribute.description: A percentage describing how much the parent map will follow the overview. e.g. followfactor="200"

configtag.description: This tag defines an overview layer
